channel.title: College on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in College on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: age
item.description: A friend sent me this article on wireless libraries. I guess it woudl follow. It would have ruled to have that option available while I was in college. stupid age. I am getting thicker.

item.title: Aerial Photos
item.description: There is something about aerial photos. they always fascinate me. it rules. my parents housemy college dormmy current residencemaybe the white house - nobody knows.. anyway. i need to goto bed.
